      • returnGamblerCard

        public void returnGamblerCard(IGamblerCard card)
        When handing in the card at a Bank teller, all betIDâ€™s on it are logged. The total amount of money credit is physically handed to the gambler, and the amount stored on the card is changed to zero. The stored betIDâ€™s on the card are also removed. Note: also use the appropriate required methods from the gambling authority API

      • checkIfBetIsValid

        public boolean checkIfBetIsValid(IGamblerCard card,
                                 Bet betToCheck)
                          throws BetNotExceptedException
        check if Bet made with the player card is possible. this is based on the amount related to the card, and the amount made in the bet.

        if the bet is valid, the amount of the bet is subtracted from the amount belonging to the card.

        Specified by:
